Morning Star Adoption Center
Ste 100
15635 W. Twelve Mile Rd.
Southfield, MI 48076
Dear Ms. Lukowski:
Your Child Placing Agency license is renewed. It is valid only at your present address
and is nontransferable. If you move, please notify us at least 30 days in advance.
You will be receiving the license in the mail.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact the area manager at (248) 975-5053.
Sincerely,
Pinkey Brown, Licensing Consultant
MDHHS\Division of Child Welfare Licensing
4th Floor, Suite 4B
51111 Woodward Avenue
Pontiac, MI 48342
(248) 860-3012
P.O. BOX 30650  LANSING, MICHIGAN 48909
www.michigan.gov  (517) 335-1980

III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
1.) The facility is in compliance with all applicable rules and statutes.
2.) Any violation listed in section 1 is also an MISEP violation. Please note that
there are additional MISEP requirements that may not be included in section
1.The facility is in compliance will all additional MISEP requirements except
for the following:
The agency is not contracted through the DHHS and not subject to MISEP
requirements.
3.) Any violation listed in section 1 is also a DHS Contract violation. Please note
that there are additional DHS Contract/Policy requirements that may not be
included in section 1. The facility is in compliance will all additional DHS
Contract/Policy requirements.
The agency is not contracted through the DHHS and not subject to DHHS
requirements.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
The facility was not offered technical assistance.
V. CONSULTATION
The facility was not offered consultation.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this
licensing period.
The agency did not have any non-compliance for their interim inspection or
received any special investigations.
4

VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes and rules and/or MISEP requirements and/or contract and policy. It is
recommended that Morning Star Adoption Center be issued a renewal of their regular
license.
June 6, 2022
